{{cpp/thread/unique_lock/title|unlock}}
{{cpp/thread/unique_lock/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++11|1=
void unlock();
}}
{{dcl end}}

Unlocks (i.e., releases ownership of) the associated mutex.

{{lc|std::system_error}} is thrown if there is no associated mutex or if the mutex is not locked.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
(none)

===Exceptions===
If there is no associated mutex or the mutex is not locked, {{lc|std::system_error}} with an error code of {{lc|std::errc::operation_not_permitted}}.
